movie.title: The King
movie.description_intro: Hal (Timothée Chalamet), wayward prince and reluctant heir to the English throne, has turned his back on royal life and is living among the people. But when his tyrannical father dies, Hal is crowned King Henry V and is forced to embrace the life he had previously tried to escape. Now the young king must navigate the palace politics, chaos and war his father left behind, and the emotional strings of his past life - including his relationship with his closest friend and mentor, the aging alcoholic knight, John Falstaff (Joel Edgerton).
movie.description_full: Hal (Timothée Chalamet), wayward prince and reluctant heir to the English throne, has turned his back on royal life and is living among the people. But when his tyrannical father dies, Hal is crowned King Henry V and is forced to embrace the life he had previously tried to escape. Now the young king must navigate the palace politics, chaos and war his father left behind, and the emotional strings of his past life - including his relationship with his closest friend and mentor, the aging alcoholic knight, John Falstaff (Joel Edgerton).

movies.title: Scorched Earth
movies.summary: A bounty hunter named Attica Gage tracks down criminals in a post-apocalyptic Earth.
movies.description_full: A bounty hunter named Attica Gage tracks down criminals in a post-apocalyptic Earth.
movies.synopsis: A bounty hunter named Attica Gage tracks down criminals in a post-apocalyptic Earth.

movies.title: Safeguard
movies.summary: When a Japanese restaurant is extorted by the Russian Mafia in London, a father takes matters into his own hands to protect his family and save their business at all costs.
movies.description_full: When a Japanese restaurant is extorted by the Russian Mafia in London, a father takes matters into his own hands to protect his family and save their business at all costs.
movies.synopsis: When a Japanese restaurant is extorted by the Russian Mafia in London, a father takes matters into his own hands to protect his family and save their business at all costs.

movies.title: The Sultan and the Saint
movies.summary: Two men of faith, one a traveling Christian preacher, the other the ruler of a Muslim Empire, bucked a century of war, distrust, and insidious propaganda in a search for mutual respect and common ground. It is the story of Francis of Assisi and the Sultan of Egypt, and their meeting on a bloody battlefield during the period of Christian- Muslim conflict known as the Crusades.

movies.title: State of Siege
movies.summary: In Uruguay in the early 1970s, an official of the US Agency for International Development (a group used as a front for training foreign police in counterinsurgency methods) is kidnapped by a group of urban guerillas. Using his interrogation as a backdrop, the film explores the often brutal consequences of the struggle between Uruguay's government and the leftist Tupamaro guerillas.
